page.title: 06Food of Today
page.content: Although the underlying trend of today is for more{wholesome food ie.less animal fats,sugar and salt and a return to wholemeal flours, the farmer and his family stick to their {traditional foods. {Breakfast}is bacon,eggs,cereal.toast and jam with a cup of tea or coffee. { Dinner}is always meat,two vegatables,potatoes and a pudding. { Teatime}is often a sandwich and a piece of cake,followed by a large supper later in the evening. Of the food on the farmers table, jam, cakes, and sometimes, the bread, are all home made, whilst the vegetables,potatoes and eggs are home produced. Meat is usually bought in bulk, ready jointed for the freezer.
